writer.name: 凯文·R·赫舍贝格 Kevin Hershberger

director.name: 凯文·R·赫舍贝格 Kevin Hershberger

this_title: Life and Death of the Army of Northern Virginia
introduction: An exciting and insightful new 60-minute, live-action documentary DVD on the life, uniforms and drill of the eastern theater Confederate Soldier - the soldiers of Robert E. Lee's Army of Northern Virginia... The film analyzes the uniforms, drill, camp life, food, weapons, equipment, etc. of the Confederate soldier of the eastern theater.
chinese_title: Life and Death of the Army of Northern Virginia
